meanings.sent1: The kerfuffle at the party was caused by the loud music.
meanings.sent2: There was a kerfuffle in the classroom when the students realized they had a pop quiz.
meanings.sent3: The kerfuffle over who gets the last cookie was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The kerfuffle of birds taking flight created a beautiful chaos in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The sudden kerfuffle of leaves rustling in the wind startled the hikers.

meanings.definition: To cause a disturbance or commotion.
meanings.sent1: Please don't kerfuffle the sleeping cat by making loud noises.
meanings.sent2: The children kerfuffled the quiet library with their laughter.
meanings.sent3: He kerfuffled the meeting by accidentally knocking over his coffee.
meanings.sent4: Her unexpected arrival kerfuffled the carefully laid plans.
meanings.sent5: The barking dog kerfuffled the peaceful neighborhood with its constant noise.
